name: the-dot
description: Modern IT Service Management & Project Management System

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:services && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:services: cd services/auth-service && npm install && cd ../user-service && npm install && cd ../application-service && npm install && cd ../ticket-service && npm install && cd ../project-service && npm install && cd ../comment-service && npm install && cd ../reporting-service && npm install && cd ../audit-service && npm install
scripts.dev:services: concurrently "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:app" "npm run dev:ticket" "npm run dev:project" "npm run dev:comment" "npm run dev:reporting" "npm run dev:audit"
scripts.build: npm run build:services && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:services: cd services/auth-service && npm run build && cd ../user-service && npm run build && cd ../application-service && npm run build && cd ../ticket-service && npm run build && cd ../project-service && npm run build && cd ../comment-service && npm run build && cd ../reporting-service && npm run build && cd ../audit-service && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:services && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:services: cd services/auth-service && npm test && cd ../user-service && npm test && cd ../application-service && npm test && cd ../ticket-service && npm test && cd ../project-service && npm test && cd ../comment-service && npm test && cd ../reporting-service && npm test && cd ../audit-service && npm test
